reviews.review_msg: Julie was really nice and a fair marker,and if you ever had any questions she was really quick in getting back to you.
Really helpful and friendly prof for an online class.

Awesome professor, even in distance ed. classes her instructions are clear, respond to email regularly. Fair marking, generally cares about student well being, exactly the kind of teacher that's needed in this department. Best of luck to her doctoral  program.

A very clear instructor but marks unnecessarily hard.  Not sure what some instructors get by making it impossible for students to achieve A+ grades. There is usually at least one student that achieves and A+ but no one in our class.  Too much group work, a waste of time.
